entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Positioned as a challenger to the large players offering an affordable superior functional coverage. Market positioning: Medium-High Functional Coverage, Low-Medium Price Level (Source: Management chart).
keyStrengths: An all-in-one and business-oriented solution embracing differentiating advanced features (Dynamic Modeling Tool, Mapping Of Things, Wizards, Spatial Dashboard, forecast scenarios…)
A unified & easy-to-use solution accessible to a wide range of users – including non-technical users
Flexible & modular platform adjustable to a wide range of use cases
A cost-effective offering positioned in the affordable segment
A strong client portfolio established for over 30 years
Strong footprint in the private sector compared to some competitors

entities.name: Articque's Geospatial Solution Platform
entities.description: An all-in-one and business-oriented solution embracing differentiating advanced features (Dynamic Modeling Tool, Mapping Of Things, Wizards, Spatial Dashboard, forecast scenarios…). A unified & easy-to-use solution accessible to a wide range of users – including non-technical users. Flexible & modular platform adjustable to a wide range of use cases. A cost-effective offering positioned in the affordable segment.

entities.characteristics: Market for geospatial solutions with players differentiated by functional coverage (Low to High) and price level (Low to High). Articque is positioned as a challenger offering affordable superior functional coverage.

entities.description: A strong client portfolio established for over 30 years.
Strong footprint in the private sector compared to some competitors.
